description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A fresh new capture the flag game, featuring multiplayer gameplay and online high scores. Compete online with your avatar and try to beat other players to be the freshest player over the world.
